data.title: Tasty burgers
data.text: Visited for lunch.  Ordered a cheeseburger and it was very good.  Prices are reasonable.  Atmosphere is a little lacking, as it has a very "industrial" feel.  Waitress was rather slow, but it may have been she was waiting for our order to come up.  Took a while to get food, and then the bill, and it wasn't very busy at the time.

data.title: First visit
data.text: Went for happy hour.  Food was good but it was a little loud.  Try the house pretzels...you will thank me for the suggestion!!!

data.title: Food was pretty bland
data.text: Food wasn't anything special, staff was very friendly, food was delivered to the table quickly and promptly. Average burger and fry place

data.title: Awesome food, awesome service
data.text:
This place is great!
I've been there twice in the last month now. 
Our server Sam, was awesome. Very attentive, prompt, and precise with our food and drinks.
This place has the BEST shrimp! Freaking delicious! 
I also wholeheartedly recommend the War Pig. Great flavor in the burger and bacon.

We're already planning our next visit!

data.title: Best philly in a long time
data.text: At first seems like a pretty unimpressive place but the food more than makes up for it.  I had the almost famous philly and I was really happy to have a place in the mid-west that didn't put green peppers on the sandwich what's more it had provolone and chez wiz yummy. The meat had great flavor and the bun was soft and fresh all together made a great sandwich.  My wife had the chicken philly she said it was awsome.  Neat menu good music a good kids menu my son likes the chicken strips. I would say the worse part is the seating almost all hi tops with a few booths so if it's busy and you have a young child it's not the best at a hi top.  I definitely will be going back.

data.title: Very disappointed.
data.text: Stopped in this weekend excited to try a new place. Only 2 other customers in the place and the service was still bad. We ordered the hamburger basket special and the dry rub wings. Hamburgers had no taste and the wings were over seasoned and over cooked. Extremely disappointed.

data.title: Nothing here for the health conscious or gluten free folks
data.text: Very disappointed that the menu has no gluten free friendly foods.  That is definitely a deal breaker for me and anyone else with Celiacs disease or wheat allergies.  Ordering a salad without dressing doesn't really work.  This establishment seems to be marketed for someone not concerned about calories, fat, or chloresteral as most items are extremely fattening.  Seems like another Babes, however, we already have one.  It would have been nice to get a new restaurant in Lakeville that offers good food to many different kinds of folk, not just one group.

data.title: Food was good, but not a place to bring your family.
data.text: I would not recommend Heavy Metal Grill to anyone visiting with a family. Bachelors that are ready to drink beers with their bros will find this a great place to hang out. I would say that the food is good and didn't have any complaints about the taste. However, if your family is okay letting your kids hear the owner yelling the F word, snapping his waitresses in the butt with a towel, or rubbing up on his waitresses while they are trying to pour a glass a beer, then I guess this place would be right up your alley. For a place in downtown Lakeville trying to gain the business of its residents, I was not impressed by the behavior of a business owner. I will say that the service that was provided by our waitress Jen was great and she was polite and professional.

data.title: Wow super impressed!
data.text: Didn't know what to expect but loved everything.  The food is very reasonably priced,  beer is cold and Cajun fries the bomb!!!  Hubby had burger oozing with cheese and thought is was very good as well.  Great must try!

data.title: Great menu!!!
data.text: We loved sitting outside on the patio and EVERYONE enjoyed the food.  The menu has something for everyone.  Very fresh and priced well.

data.title: OK place but not yet great
data.text: The food is good, maybe very good if you like unusual specialty hamburgers.  They have a good selection of beers.  The place has more of a feel of a bar than a grill.  The tables are all high tops and it is noisy.

data.title: Yummyy!
data.text: good service and very good food - I did take out and called ahead and it was ready when I got there and seemed to have just been taken off the grill

data.title: Delicious Food
data.text:
Very nice atmosphere, and great food.
It is nice to have another local dining establishment. 
I used a groupon here.

data.title: DISAPPOINTED
data.text: This was my families 2nd visit here and we will not be returning. My son ordered the chicken wings and they were NOT FULLY COOKED. Blood coming out of the chicken wing! Just disgusting. My 1st time coming here was great, don't know what happen. Maybe they changed cooks but I will not return

data.title: Disappointing
data.text: This was our second time here. The food was excellent the first and subpar the last. Our Motley Q Philly sandwiches were both missing the fried onions. The cook smothered the sandwich with BBQ sauce. The french fries were not as good either. The oil needed to be changed. Customers were waiting for tables and the cook may have been overwhelmed with food orders.

data.title: It's a bar.  It's bar food.
data.text: It's just OK.  Not sure downtown Lakeville needed another 'bar' restaurant.  If your just looking for a burger and a beer it's fine.

data.title: GREAT FOOD!
data.text: Found this restaurant on Groupon. Great Philly chicken and Philly cheese steaks sandwiches. Will definitely return.

data.title: Great Food & Fun Atmosphere
data.text: We found this restaurant on TripAdvisor when in the area and the saw a Groupon. My husband being into heavy metal, had to check it out. We were not disappointed. The food was great---the fries fresh and hot and the burgers were enormous and fantastic.  The service was great as well. Our waitress was the only person working in the front of the house and she checked on us quite frequently. If you're in the area and looking for a great burger at a neat restaurant, check the Heavy Metal Grill out!

data.title: Good Pub Food... Philly Out-Performs Burger
data.text:
Very cool little Bar & Grill. Has a great atmosphere with the staff and food to back it up. Service out from the kitchen was rather slow... We were not in a rush but had a beer and payed 3 rounds of pinball before our food came. 

The Philly was really good but the burgers were only average. Dry would be a good description. So, If you you have your heart set on a burger I might try another location... If you want a Philly or pub style Sandwich then I totally recommend The Heavy Metal Grill.

data.title: So-so place and average food
data.text: Having heard from a few friends about this place, decided to visit it to order various varieties of Chicken Philly burgers, and only one of them was good.  It was an hour before closing on a Sunday with just four tables, and wait staff was literally non-existent. The food came fast, but did not wow us and neither did my screw-driver, which was watered down for $5.  Worth a try if you want to,
